## Repository Structure
- `admin/`: Admin interface components
- `docs/`: Documentation
- `test_scripts/`: Test scripts for the HARVEST application. These scripts help validate functionality and can be used for manual testing and verification.
- `frontend/`: contains modularised components of the HARVEST application.
- `assets/`: contains static files and documentation served by the HARVEST application.

## Key Guidelines
1. Follow Go best practices
2. Maintain existing code structure and organization
3. When documenting suggest changes to the `docs/` folder and consolidate documentation when appropriate
